name: Obol
description:
#UE4JAM - SPR19

Obol

Legend has it that there is an ancient coin that can cure any illness, restore any disability, bring back from near death -- but to obtain this relic, one must walk amongst the dead. You are requested to by an old sacred organization to disembark through an ancient church’s deep basement in search of the legendary Obol to cure a young girl dying from an unknown disease. Fight through the undead and other fiends as an armed priest devoted to demon and ghoul slaying. Grab the Obol and come back from the other side of death. Good Luck, be brave, and fight smart!

Happy #UE4 GameJam! Obol has been influenced by the following phrase:

“The Other Side of the Coin”
